document.heading: Driver Safety Clarification Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-145, the “Driver Safety Clarification Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-694. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 24, 2014, and July 14, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 29, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-388 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-145 became effective on Dec. 17, 2014.
